CLUE: Branch of linguistics concerned with meanings
FOUND IN: Lexical Semantics - Study of the structure, development, and interpretation of words in language; analyzing their meaning relations like synonyms, antonyms, hyponyms, etc.
Galatia: An ancient province of central Asia Minor (modern-day Turkey), situated close to the future location of Constantinople and its successor city, Istanbul.
It serves as both a symbol of unity and an instrument for cultural identity, enabling effective communication across different ethnicities within Haiti.
